siteDescription: We are the Russian speaking Seventh-day Adventist church serving the New York metropolitan area for more than 20 years. We are a diverse community of people with a passion to be the light and the salt of the earth.

footer.main: First Russian SDA Church of New York City | 1913 W 7th St, Brooklyn, New York 11223
